title: Joe Biden: "Promises to Keep"
description: Michael's conversation with then-Senator Joe Biden, who was on the presidential campaign trail when his memoir "Promises to Keep" was released on 31 July 2007. This Interview aired in August 2007.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Joe Biden)
